channel.title: [637-639] Weapon Attack Animations
channel.description: Hey guys I have gotten some good help on these forums so I am deciding to post this here rather than the "other sites" so yeah..So I am using Dementhium 637-639 and some weapons such as: swords, battleaxes, hatchets, and a few other things are not attacking right. When I attack an NPC with them all I do is punch. I have checked the itemdefeditor.bat and also the equip ids. Does anyone know where else I can try to change the animations at?

item.title: [637-639] Weapon Attack Animations
item.dc:creator: @InfusedScape InfusedScape
item.description:
@InfusedScape wrote:

Hey guys I have gotten some good help on these forums so I am deciding to post this here rather than the “other sites” so yeah…So I am using Dementhium 637-639 and some weapons such as: swords, battleaxes, hatchets, and a few other things are not attacking right. When I attack an NPC with them all I do is punch. I have checked the itemdefeditor.bat and also the equip ids. Does anyone know where else I can try to change the animations at?

Read full topic
